personalInfo.name: Nguyen Thien Nam
personalInfo.title: A Multi-Talented Individual in Art, Music, Development, Content Creation, and Story Writing

development.name: M4sk Discord Bot
development.description: A versatile Discord bot offering fun and utility commands, including an economy system and RPG adventure game. Not only that, M4sk provides a reputation-based system for moderation which can help moderators, administrators and owners manage the server way more efficient. There are also features for customizable responses, embeds, and colors via a simple dashboard.

development.name: The Blood of Heroes
development.description: The Blood of Heroes is an immersive chat-based role-playing game, set in a richly detailed fantasy world. Players will follow a written story, which can be twisted easily by the player's decisions. The game is designed to be challenging and fun, with a unique and engaging storyline. The Blood of Heroes is a great way to explore your creativity and imagination.

art.title: My Imagination
art.description: An artwork representing my mental and psychological self, created purely from imagination.

art.title: My Universe
art.description: An artwork representing my imagination about space, solar systems, and other aspects of the universe.

music.title: Sunset
music.description: An original composition. This piece was made after looking at the beautiful sunset in my lovely hometown of Hanoi, Vietnam.
